description: I'm a DevOps Engineer / Technical Support Analyst with over 5 years of experience in designing, implementing and maintaining software solutions using various tools, open-source technologies and cloud services. I have a strong background in Linux based infrastructure, Ruby, Python, Perl and Java.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about optimizing the software development cycle, increasing the frequency and quality of updates, and enabling continuous delivery of value in organizations. By leveraging my DevOps engineering skills, I collaborate with different teams to create and maintain reliable, secure and scalable software solutions.
